p: We consider four state-of-the-art IAMs: GCAM [ 28], MESSAGE-GLOBIOM [ 29], IMAGE [ 30] and REMIND-MAgPIE [ 31]. The reader is referred to the respective publications for more background on each model. Land-cover classes are nearly identical among these models and only minor reassignments had to be applied to have joint classes for the comparisons ( table 3). For each of the IAMs, we show the instantaneous land-cover state (expressed as land-cover fractions) for a particular (common) year in the future projections after remapping the model output to a common regular 0.5Â° grid, or differences of these datasets between considered time frames.
